author: Patrick Van Cauteren

changelog.release_notes:
Major upgrade.

On popular request you can now choose between 10 different color schemes.
Seconds can be shown as well (as a bar that crawls from left to right).
Keep the suggestions coming.
Solved a problem where the step target was only recalculated in the first paint event.

Health bar is now configurable.  You can show the daily step average of last week, or a configured target.

Keep the suggestions coming!

Guido asked to get a step counter on the watch face.
Here it is: the number of steps and the walked distance in meters is shown.

Richard asked to be able to configure a white background.
Here it is: just select white background in the configuration screen.
Solved color problem in battery status visualization.

Corrected some incorrect characters in Spanish, Norwegian and Danish.
Bluetooth-connection-circle is now shown as 11th circle instead of 10th circle.

Added support for Danish, Norwegian and Swedish.

If BlueTooth is disconnected, a small red circle is shown in the bottom-right corner.

Follow-up of PVC's Biggy.

Just like my Essentials and Biggy, it is intended to for people that just need the essential information (time, day of the week, day of the month, battery status) and prefer a bigger font.

Differences with Biggy are: the fonts are bigger, slightly changed layout, bluetooth status is not shown here (since this is most of the time active anyway).

Supported languages for the weekdays are: English, Dutch, French, German, Spanish and Italian.

description:
Intended to for people that just need the essential information (time, day of the week, day of the month, battery status) and prefer a bigger font.  Choice of 10 different color schemes.

Supported languages for the weekdays are: English, Dutch, French, German, Spanish, Italian, Danish, Norwegian and Swedish.

The health bar shows the number of steps today, and can be extended with the daily step average of last week or a chosen target.

latest_release.release_notes:
Major upgrade.

On popular request you can now choose between 10 different color schemes.
Seconds can be shown as well (as a bar that crawls from left to right).
Keep the suggestions coming.

title: PVC's Biggy Too
